column4: i know this isn't support for adobe air, but when i sudo sh ./AdobeAIRInstaller.bin i get a Syntax error: "(" unexpected. not sure if i'm trying to install it incorrectly or if it's a problem with the software
maybe that bin file is not a shell script. try « chmod +x ./AdobeAIRInstaller.bin && ./AdobeAIRInstaller.bin & »
